using System;

public class Program
{
	public static void Main()
	{
		float[] values = {
			0.0f,
			0.0000000000000000000000000001f,
			0.000000000000000000000000001f,
			0.0000000000000000000000000012f,
			0.0000000000000000000000000015f,
			0.0000000000000000000000000019f,
			0.00000000000000000000000001f,
			0.0000000000000000000000000123f,
			0.0000000000000000000000000151f,
			0.0000000000000000000000000190f,
			0.0000000000000000000000001f,
			0.0000000000000000000000001237f,
			0.0000000000000000000000001519f,
			0.0000000000000000000000001906f,
			0.000000000000000000000001f,
			0.0000000000000000000000022137f,
			0.0000000000000000000000075149f,
			0.0000000000000000000000049106f,
			0.00000000000000000000001f,
			0.000000000000000000000022137f,
			0.0000000000000000000000751149f,
			0.0000000000000000000000494106f,
			0.00000000000000000000011f,
			0.000000000000000000000221327f,
			0.000000000000000000000751419f,
			0.000000000000000000000491096f,
			0.0000000000000000000011f,
			0.0000000000000000000022137f,
			0.0000000000000000000075149f,
			0.0000000000000000000049106f,
			0.000000000000000000011f,
			0.000000000000000000022137f,
			0.000000000000000000075149f,
			0.000000000000000000049106f,
			0.00000000000000000011f,
			0.00000000000000000022137f,
			0.00000000000000000075149f,
			0.00000000000000000049106f,
			0.0000000000000000011f,
			0.0000000000000000022137f,
			0.0000000000000000075149f,
			0.0000000000000000049106f,
			0.000000000000000011f,
			0.000000000000000022137f,
			0.000000000000000075149f,
			0.000000000000000049106f,
			0.00000000000000011f,
			0.00000000000000022137f,
			0.00000000000000075149f,
			0.00000000000000049106f,
			0.0000000000000011f,
			0.0000000000000022137f,
			0.0000000000000075149f,
			0.0000000000000049106f,
			0.000000000000011f,
			0.000000000000022137f,
			0.000000000000075149f,
			0.000000000000049106f,
			0.00000000000011f,
			0.00000000000022137f,
			0.00000000000075149f,
			0.00000000000049106f,
			0.0000000000011f,
			0.0000000000022137f,
			0.0000000000075149f,
			0.0000000000049106f,
			0.000000000011f,
			0.000000000022137f,
			0.000000000075149f,
			0.000000000049106f,
			0.00000000011f,
			0.00000000022137f,
			0.00000000075149f,
			0.00000000049106f,
			0.0000000011f,
			0.0000000022137f,
			0.0000000075149f,
			0.0000000049106f,
			0.000000011f,
			0.000000022137f,
			0.000000075149f,
			0.000000049106f,
			0.00000011f,
			0.00000022137f,
			0.00000075149f,
			0.00000049106f,
			0.0000011f,
			0.0000022137f,
			0.0000075149f,
			0.0000049106f,
			0.000011f,
			0.000022137f,
			0.000075149f,
			0.000049106f,
			0.00011f,
			0.00022137f,
			0.00075149f,
			0.00049106f,
			0.0011f,
			0.0022137f,
			0.0075149f,
			0.0049106f,
			0.011f,
			0.022137f,
			0.075149f,
			0.049106f,
			0.11f,
			0.22137f,
			0.75149f,
			0.49106f,
			1.01f,
			1.0073f,
			1.100281f,
			1.83182811f,
			2.38183f,		
			0f,
			-1f,
			1f,
			-2f,
			2f,
			-3f,
			3f,
			-10f,
			10f,
			-128f,
			127f,
			255f,
			-32768f,
			32767f,
			-32767f,
			137f,
			342f,
			-32860f,
			33223f,
			56210f,
			-65535f,
			65535f,
			212818281f,
			-2818281f,
			-2147483647f,
			100f,
			1782f,
			-821821f,
			218128f,
			9999f,
			-9999999f,
			2147483647f,
			-2147483648f,
			0.12001f,
			0.465f,
			0.0465f,
			0.0000465f,
			0.9999999f,
			16253.018261f,
			1.0e-28f,
			-1.0e28f,
			12345678.0f,
			1234567.50f,
			1234567.9f,
			-0.00167f,
			19.999998f,
			-0.92345877f,
			7.017213E28f,
			7.2117213E27f,
			7.3417213E26f,
			7.417213E25f,
			7.517213E24f,
			7.617213E23f,
			7.217213E22f,
			7.31217213E21f,
			7.747217213E20f,
			7.423117213E19f,
			7.85817213E18f,
			7.18667213E17f,
			7.172966613E16f,
			7.172868613E15f,
			7.172121213E14f,
		};
		Console.WriteLine("static float src[] = {");
		foreach (var value in values) {
			Console.WriteLine("{0}f,", value.ToString("G70"));
		}
		Console.WriteLine("};");
		Console.WriteLine();

		Console.WriteLine("static s21_decimal dst[] = {");
		foreach (var value in values) {
			double val = value;
			decimal tmp = (decimal) value;
			int[] bits = Decimal.GetBits(tmp);
			Console.WriteLine("{{{{ 0x{0,8:X8}, 0x{1,8:X8}, 0x{2,8:X8}, 0x{3,8:X8} }}}}, // {4,-10}",
							  bits[0], bits[1], bits[2], bits[3], tmp);
		}
		Console.WriteLine("};");
	}
}
